description:
Colgate Total Antibacterial Advanced Clean Toothpaste smoothes and polishes teeth and provides a superior clean with stronger 12 hour bacterial defense***

Colgate Total Antibacterial Fluoride toothpaste has a unique formula that keeps your whole mouth healthy by fighting bacteria on teeth, tongue, cheeks, and gums for 12 hours*. Colgate Total Advanced Clean is formulated with micro cleaning particles similar to what dentists use. Smooths and polishes teeth and provides a superior clean**.

A Healthier You

Every day, we make it our mission to get you feeling your best - and we believe a healthy mouth makes a difference in being ready for what's ahead.
So we are truly excited that you've chosen us to help you step forward confidently into life, with a smile that's healthy as can be.

Colgate Total Whole Mouth Health Toothpaste helps to:

• Prevents cavities
• Remove plaque
• Protect enamel
• Prevent tartar buildup
• Freshen breath
• Whiten teeth
• Protect gums

No Colgate Toothpaste contains Sugar. Colgate Total toothpaste are also Vegan, Gluten Free and Responsibly Made^

Recommended by: The Australian Dental Association (ADA) & New Zealand Dental Association (NZDA).

Boxed contents: 1 Toothpaste
Size: 115g

*With 4 weeks of continuous use
**vs. a regular fluoride toothpaste
***vs. ordinary non-antibacterial fluoride toothpastes, with 4 weeks of continued use
^To learn more, visit colgatepalmolive.com/responsibly-made

WHOLE MOUTH HEALTH: Colgate Total Toothpaste has a unique formula that helps reduce bacteria on your teeth, tongue, cheeks and gums, helping keep your whole mouth healthy with 4 weeks of continuous use

STRONGER 12-HOUR BACTERIAL DEFENSE: Use Colgate Total Antibacterial Toothpaste for a stronger 12 hour bacterial defense***

ADVANCED CLEAN: Smoothes and polishes teeth and provides a superior clean

CAVITY PROTECTION: Formula helps to remove plaque with brushing and prevents buildup of cavities and tartar

ADDITIONAL BENEFITS: Freshens breath, protects gums and enamel
name: Colgate Total Advanced Clean Antibacterial Toothpaste 115g
